title: ONLY 15 MINS TO THE CITY! LIVE BY THE PACIFICA PIER & BEACH TODAY
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', '2 BR, 1 BA', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'Today', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'Pet Policy Type: Cat, DogMax Number of Pets: 1Pet deposit fee max: $600Pet monthly rent max: $50Pet policy fee max: $50Pet policy:We welcome dogs and cats up to 1 pet per apartment home.', 'There is an additional $600 pet deposit and pet fee of $50 at move-in.', 'Monthly pet rent is $50 per month per pet.', 'There is a weight limit of 35 lbs.', 'and some breed restrictions apply.', 'Please call our Leasing Center for our complete pet policy.', 'Deposit:', '600', 'Leasing options:', '6 months,9 months,9+ months,12 months', 'Leasing notes:', 'CURRENTLY HAVE A  1 & 2BR AVAILABILITY BUT ONLY HAVE A 2BR TO SHOW.', 'Application fee:', '$39 per adult', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost:', 'All Utilities Paid by Resident', 'Utilities Cost:', 'Varies per month', 'Laundry:', 'Convenient Laundry Care Center', 'Parking type:', 'Covered, Assigned Parking', 'Parking notes:', 'None', 'Appliances:', 'Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range/Oven, Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Exterior:', 'Private Patio or Balcony Area', 'Heating/cooling:', 'Wiring:', 'Cable-ready, High-speed internet', 'Facilities and Recreation:', 'Fitness center, Barbecue', 'Security and Access:', 'Controlled access', 'Views:', 'Water, Beautiful Pacifica Beach Community, Walking Distance to Pacifica Beach & Pier', 'Additional features:', 'Spacious Floorplans w/ Designer Finishes, Quartz Counters & Modern Cabinetry, Open Kitchen layout w/ Breakfast Bar, Oversized Mirrored Closets, Wood Like Flooring in Kitchen & Baths, Easy Access to Highways 1, 101 & 280', 'Offered by:', 'Seapointe', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
